summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for Gratitude America, Ltd. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest payments for the account as of April 30, 2017.

persons.name: Steuart Oldfield

keyFacts: The account balance for Gratitude America, Ltd. as of April 30, 2017, was $1,038,964.89.
The document details an interest payment of $256.12 credited to the account on April 30, 2017.
There were no checks paid or ATM withdrawals during the statement period.
Service charges for the statement period totaled $50.00.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding the account.
